page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT IN/ROUND CHAGFORD
page.content: The opportunities for Employment in Chagford and District are very limited being restricted to those in{tourism, {agriculture}and{service industries. No heavy or light industry of any note exists and many people commute into {Exeter, Newton Abbot}and{Okehampton for work. Individuals are known who travel daily to{Totnes}and{Barnstaple. Many local people are engaged in{farm {work}of one kind or another and this is probably the single most common form of employment. The situation for school_leavers is not very hopeful and where there isn't the opportunity to take over the family business the only alternative is to look outside Chag_ ford. The summer holiday season does provide some opportunity for{casual {labour}for young people but one has to be fortunate to obtain regular local employment.
